channel.title: Workshops on Wind&Bones
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on Wind&Bones

item.title: Waterford Food Manifesto
item.description: Last summer, we worked with GIY (Ireland), Ashoka, and the wonderful Dr. Sarah Prosser on a project to develop a manifesto for future food in the Waterford Bioregion. We co-ran a workshop with local farmers, community members and consumers, leading to the drafting of a manifesto for rethinking the centrality of food in all of our lives. You can read more about the project here: Waterford Manifesto. We’re delighted that the manifesto is now available on YouTube, read by Ray McGrath, who took part in the workshop.
